headline.main: GANDHI BARS IDEA OF ALLIED PLEDGE; Rejects Any Truce Based Upon Guarantee of Independence -- Demands Freedom Now NEW PARLEYS SUGGESTED Indian State Official Urges Nationalist Chief to Confer With Stalin and Chiang

abstract: Gandhi bars pol truce based on United Nations guarantee of Brit post-war freedom pledge; demands immediate freedom; R H Parker, State Council Eur member, suggests Gandi conf with Chiang Kai-shek and Stalin; M N Roy, Indian Radical Dem party leader, suggests immediate establishment of wartime govt representing all Indian parties except Cong
snippet: Gandhi bars pol truce based on United Nations guarantee of Brit post-war freedom pledge; demands immediate freedom; R H Parker, State Council Eur member, suggests Gandi conf with Chiang Kai-shek and Stalin; M N Roy, Indian Radical Dem party leader...
